bibl.title: A Wall Painting at Karanis Used for Architectural Protection. The Curious Case of Harpocrates and Toutou in Granary C65.
bibl.note: Description of painting. [Harpocrates seated on a seat or throne and Toutou striding left and facing outwards to the viewer.] - The archaeological context. - The painting and the granary.

bibl.title: Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike.

bibl.seg: Andrew T. Wilburn, A Wall Painting at Karanis Used for Architectural Protection. The Curious Case of Harpocrates and Toutou in Granary C65.

Carolin Arlt & Martin Andreas Stadler (edd.), unter Mitarbeit von Ulrike Weinmann, Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike (Wiesbaden, 2013) pp. 181-193, 3 pll.
Description of painting. [Harpocrates seated on a seat or throne and Toutou striding left and facing outwards to the viewer.] - The archaeological context. - The painting and the granary.
